original_text: The shepherds waited until all the sheep were there together. Then they removed the stone from the top of the well. They gave their sheep water to drink, and then they put the stone back on the top of the well.
korean_text: 모든 떼가 모이면 그들이 우물 아귀에서 돌을 옮기고 그 양 떼에게 물을 먹이고는 우물 아귀 그 자리에 다시 그 돌을 덮더라

sentences.original_text: until all the sheep were there together
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 양들이 함께 그곳에 있을 때까지

sentences.original_text: from the top of the well
They gave their sheep water to drink
and then they put the stone back
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 그들은 돌을 다시 놓았습니다

sentences.original_text: on the top of the well
